text: Jesse Arreguín (born September 4, 1984) is an American politician who is a member of the California State Senate since 2024, representing the 7th district. Arreguín has described himself as an "unapologetic progressive" and said he wants to "restore Berkeley to the forefront of progressive leadership on the environment and social justice." ==References== Category:1984 births Category:Living people Category:Politicians from Berkeley, California Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Jesse Arreguín
